description: Unique row identifier for this work order–accident link, used as the primary key.
System-generated date-time when this link record was created or last updated (format likely yyyymmddhhmmssSSS; timezone unclear; confirm with SME).
Free-text notes about the relationship between the work order and the accident, such as context or justification.
Identifier of the related accident/incident record associated to the work order.
Reference discriminator indicating the entity or table for the accident foreign key; likely used by a generic relationship model; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the related work order linked to the accident record.
Reference discriminator indicating the entity or table for the work order foreign key; likely used by a generic relationship model; confirm with SME.
Source system’s original key for this relationship, used for migration or cross-system tracing.
Name of the source system table from which this relationship originated, used for legacy mapping or auditing.
